PathOfBuilding2.Notes:
This POB contains 2 variants of the Lich Storm Mage build, one for ^2Low Budget ^7and one for ^4Medium Budget. ^7You can swap between the 2 different variants, along with a couple of different stage of the build, in the Loadout drop down menu on the top right of the screen
^7While its impossible to provide a firm price range, the ^2Low Budget ^7variant should be quite accessible and is less gear reliant while the^4 Medium Budget ^7requires more significant thought and specific gear to function.
If you are looking for a leveling guide for the lich you can find that here: ^x8888FFhttps://www.poe-vault.com/poe2/witch/lich/minion-leveling-guide-2
^7For the written guide that accompanies this POB check out:
^6NOTE: ^7Rather than adding suffixes to all the gear, we have intentionally left most affixes open on the gear and added a custom modifier in the configuration window to simulate achieving 75% all resistances and meeting attribute requirements You WILL need to meet the minimum Attribute requirements, and also cap your Elemental Resistances, while getting as much Chaos Resistance as possible.
^1RUNES
^7We have left the sockets empty on all gear, you should use runes, soul cores and talismans to help fix attributes and resistances or boost your energy shield/evasion. More specific details can be found in the written guide

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
^6=== Compensation for No Suffixes === +115% to all elemental resistances +55% to chaos resistance +150 dexterity
^6=== Muster Calc (only accurate on Storm DPS === Minions deal 28% more damage
^6=== Sigil of Power buff === Minions deal 52% more damage
